PackageOracle.name: DA_SERVICE_LOCATION
PackageOracle.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE CHTR.DA_SERVICE_LOCATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.306636000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
);

END da_service_location;

body.name: DA_SERVICE_LOCATION
body.source:
CREATE OR REPLACE PACKAGE BODY CHTR.DA_SERVICE_LOCATION
/* Generated on 20-JAN-15 03.40.16.316861000 PM -06:00 */
AS

PROCEDURE add (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_location.add, parms=' || access_method_id || '|' || street_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
INSERT INTO chtr.t_service_location a
(
a.access_method_id
,a.street_address_id
,a.record_stat
,a.created_dttm
,a.created_by
,a.modified_dttm
,a.modified_by
)
VALUES
(
add.access_method_id
,add.street_address_id
,'A'
,SYSTIMESTAMP
,add.audit_user
,NULL
,NULL
);
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_location.add');

END add;

PROCEDURE del (
process_rec IN pkg_logging.t_process_rec
,access_method_id IN NUMBER
,street_address_id IN NUMBER
,audit_user IN VARCHAR2
)
IS
BEGIN

chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'begin da_service_location.del, parms=' || access_method_id || '|' || street_address_id || '|' || audit_user || '|');
UPDATE chtr.t_service_location a
SET a.record_stat = 'D'
,a.modified_dttm = SYSTIMESTAMP
,a.modified_by = del.audit_user
WHERE a.access_method_id = del.access_method_id
AND a.street_address_id = del.street_address_id
;
chtr.pkg_logging.log_debug (process_rec, 'end da_service_location.del');

END del;

END da_service_location;
